verbs.description: WASHINGTON , D.C. -- [ARG2: The highly anticipated meeting] [V: involving] [ARG1: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jon Un] will happen on June 12 . The president made the announcement on his Twitter account , saying the meeting would take place in Singapore .
